name: CamViews
description: CamViews is a mobile wireless video intercom system that support Two-way voice communication and remote door releasing. The application is available mobile phone and tablet. With WiFi/3G/4G connection, intercom and door release all remotely controlled by your smart phone or tablet, no matter where the location you are, even you are away from home. DIY installation, simple operation.   Features:  -In-call ringtone alert -Dual way communication -Remote unlocking -Premium HD video -Snap & Record -Support Android / iOS devices -Wifi enabled or wired router -67 independent servers  -Antenna and outdoor station separated -Multiple Users -Night vision -Code access CamViews is a mobile wireless video intercom system that support Two-way voice communication and remote door releasing. The application is available mobile phone and tablet. With WiFi / 3G / 4G connection, intercom and door release all remotely controlled by your smart phone or tablet , no matter where the location you are, even you are away from home. DIY installation, simple operation.  Features: -In-Call ringtone alert -Dual Way communication -Remote Unlocking -Premium HD video -Snap & Record -Support Android / iOS devices -Wifi Enabled or wired router -67 Independent servers -Antenna And outdoor station separated -Multiple Users -Night Vision -Code Access
